This module implements a sugar for c-style shift fields. Useful in cases of buffer casting while working with filesystems and archives in nim.

For example:

#define FLAG_A			0
#define FLAG_B			1

#define FLAG_BIT(flag, bit) ((flag >> bit) & 1)

#define A_SHIFTER(flags) FLAG_BIT(flags, FLAG_A)

#define B_SHIFTER(flags) FLAG_BIT(flags, FLAG_B)

struct c_header {
         __le16			magic;
         __le8			flags;
};

May be declared in nim as:

type
  Flags = enum
    FlagA = 0
    FlagB = 1
  
  MySF = ShiftField[uint8]
  
  NimHeader = object
    magic: uint16
    flags: MySF

let h = NimHeader(magic: 0'u16, flags: initShiftField[MySF](@[FlagB]))

assert h.flags == 0b10'u8
assert not h.flags.isSet(FlagA)

if h.flags.isSet(FlagB):
  echo "(o_O) flag b is set !"
Warning: The getShifts disable the HoleEnumConv warning in proc body. If u know how to avoid this - pr welcome.

Types

ShiftField[T] = T

Procs

func contains[T: SomeInteger](a: openArray[T]; item: enum): bool {.inline,
    noinit, ...raises: [].}

Returns true if item is in a or false if not found. This is a system contains but for enum values.

This allows the in operator: a.contains(item) is the same as item in a.

Example:

type Flags {.pure.} = enum
  a = 5
  b = 7
  c = 9

let shifts = getShifts(0b1000100000'u16, Flags)
assert a in shifts
assert b notin shifts
assert c in shifts
func getShifts(sf: ShiftField; e: typedesc[enum]): seq[int] {.inline, noinit,
    ...raises: [].}
Returns int typed seq of established in sf bits by e enum shift values.

Example:

type Flags {.pure.} = enum
  a = 0
  b = 1
  c = 2

let shifts = getShifts(0b101'u8, Flags)
assert shifts == @[0, 2]
assert shifts == initShiftField[uint8](@[a, c]).getShifts(Flags)
func getShiftsOf[T: SomeInteger](sf: ShiftField; e: typedesc[enum]): seq[T] {.
    ...raises: [].}
Returns T typed seq of established in sf bits by e enum shift values. 
func initShiftField[T: SomeUnsignedInt](s: seq[enum]): ShiftField[T] {.
    ...raises: [].}
Initializes an ShiftField[T] using seq s values for shifting. 
func isSet(sf: ShiftField; e: enum): bool {....raises: [].}
Checks if an enum e bit contains in ShiftField sf.
